nodes.excerpt: Teach without videos and zoom sessions. We enable best minds to share their knowledge in minutes. Average time to launch a course is 2 months. Launch your course under 2 minutes with Questbook. What Twitter has done to blogging, Questbook does to learning.

nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 无需视频和变焦课程的教学。我们让最优秀的人才能够在几分钟内分享他们的知识。推出一个课程的平均时间是2个月。使用Questbook在2分钟内推出您的课程。Twitter对博客的作用，Questbook对学习的作用。

localize.tagline: 每周登陆页拆解，直接进入您的收件箱。

nodes.excerpt: Pulls structured data from any website as easily as copy paste. Whether lists of people and companies from directories, search engines or any website, Clay already understands the web and automatically fills them in a spreadsheet for you. -Automated CRM-
nodes.title: Clay - The spreadsheet that fills itself
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

localize.description: 从任何网站上提取结构化数据，就像复制粘贴一样简单。无论是来自目录、搜索引擎还是任何网站的人员和公司名单，Clay都能理解网络，并为您自动将其填入电子表格。-自动CRM-
localize.tagline: 填充自己的电子表格

nodes.excerpt: Eqtble unlocks the value of your HR data by answering why top performers are leaving and why qualified candidates are declining offers. Built by connecting with 150+ systems, we deliver insights on Workforce, Talent Acquisition, Engagement, and Compensation.
nodes.title: eqtble - Making it easy for companies to gain insights from HR data
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

localize.description: Eqtble通过回答为什么表现优异的员工会离开，为什么合格的候选人会拒绝聘用，来释放您的人力资源数据的价值。通过与150多个系统的连接，我们提供关于劳动力、人才招聘、参与和薪酬的见解。
localize.tagline: 让企业轻松从人力资源数据中获得洞察力。

localize.description: Eqtble通過回答爲什麼表現優異的員工會離開，爲什麼合格的候選人會拒絕聘用，來釋放您的人力資源數據的價值。通過與150多個系統的連接，我們提供關於勞動力、人才招聘、參與和薪酬的見解。
localize.tagline: 讓企業輕鬆從人力資源數據中獲得洞察力。

nodes.excerpt: Meditation apps are great but they don’t address real world events and situations. I curse. You curse. Why shouldn’t your meditations? We recorded some oddly specific meditations for your peace of mind. Presenting MindF*** from the makers at Bad Unicorn 🦄
nodes.title: MindF*** - It’s like Headspace but with occasional profanity 🙉

localize.description: 冥想应用程序是伟大的，但他们不解决现实世界的事件和情况。我诅咒。你也会诅咒。为什么你的冥想不应该？我们录制了一些奇特的冥想，让你心安理得。呈现MindF***来自Bad Unicorn的制作者 🦄。

localize.tagline: 這就像Headspace，但偶爾會有髒話🙉。

nodes.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.

nodes.excerpt: Prize Card™ is a debit card that lets you win money and rewards instantly every time you use it. When you pay using Prize Card™ the merchant (i.e. the store) pays us a small transaction fee which we use to fund giveaways.
nodes.title: Prize - Debit card with amazing rewards
nodes.author: Hyacinthe Hamon

localize.description: Prize Card™是一种借记卡，让您每次使用时都能立即赢得金钱和奖励。当您使用Prize Card™付款时，商家（即商店）会向我们支付少量的交易费，我们将其用于资助赠品。
localize.tagline: 奖励丰厚的借记卡

localize.description: Prize Card™是一種借記卡，讓您每次使用時都能立即贏得金錢和獎勵。當您使用Prize Card™付款時，商家（即商店）會向我們支付少量的交易費，我們將其用於資助贈品。
localize.tagline: 獎勵豐厚的借記卡
